name: big-pecks
effect: This Pokémon's Defense cannot be lowered by other Pokémon. This Pokémon can still be passed negative Defense modifiers through heart swap or guard swap.

flavor_text.black_white: Protects the Pokémon from Defense-lowering attacks.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: Protects the Pokémon from Defense-lowering attacks.
